''For the Disney Channel in other countries, see [[Disney Channel (international)]]. For the original Disney Channel, see [[Disney Channel]]
Disney Channel Taiwan is a television channel that is broadcast in Taiwan.
==Shows== * [[Phineas and Ferb]] * [[Mickey Mouse Clubhouse]] * [[Stitch!]] * [[Good Luck Charlie]] * [[Sonny with a Chance]] * [[Hannah Montana]] * [[Wizards Of Waverly Place]] * [[Fish Hooks]] * [[Mr. Bean: The Animated Series]] * [[American Dragon]] * [[Pleasant Goat and Big Big Wolf]] * [[I'm in the Band]] * [[Martin Mystery]] * [[The Replacements]] * [[The Suite Life of Zack & Cody]] * [[Timon & Pumbaa (TV series)]] * [[Jake and the Never Land Pirates]] * [[Totally Spies!]] * [[Shake It Up (TV series)]] * [[As The Bell Rings]] * [[Little Einsteins]] * [[Oscar's Oasis]] * [[Spider-Man: The Animated Series]] * [[Teamo Supremo]] * [[Handy Manny]] * [[Special Agent Oso]] * [[Jungle Junction]] * [[The Octonauts]] * [[Animal Mechanicals]] * [[Timmy Time]] * [[Word World]] * [[Pucca]] * [[Lilo and Stitch]] * [[Kim Possible]] * [[Shaun the Sheep]]
==Movies== Disney Channel Taiwan airs movies at 6pm every day. All movies are Rated-G. ===Current Movies=== * ''[[High School Musical]]'' * ''[[High School Musical 2]]'' * ''[[The Cheetah Girls (film)|The Cheetah Girls]]'' * ''[[The Cheetah Girls 2]]'' * ''[[The Cheetah Girls One World]]'' * ''[[Camp Rock ]]'' * ''[[Freaky Friday (2003 film)|Freaky Friday]]'' * ''[[Ice Princess]]'' * ''[[Jump In!]]'' * ''[[Wendy Wu: Homecoming Warrior]]'' * ''[[Cow Belles]]'' * ''[[Twitches (film)|Twitches]]'' * ''[[Twitches Too]]'' * ''[[Halloweentown]]'' * ''[[Halloweentown High]]'' * ''[[Return to Halloweentown]]'' * ''[[Cars (Film)|Cars]]'' * ''[[Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest]]'' * ''[[Dadnapped]]'' * ''[[Hatching Pete]]'' * ''[[Princess Protection Program]]'' * ''[[Wizards of Waverly Place: The Movie]]'' * ''[[Hannah Montana: The Movie]]'' * ''[[The Princess and the Frog]]'' * ''[[Princess Monomoke]]'' * ''[[Sprited Away]]''
